message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $8,000 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is quite high. I'm willing to come down to $10,000.  This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. However, I still believe that $8,000 is a fair price for the product. I am willing to negotiate further if possible.
